examples: the very deep gratitude I felt towards her
His kindness and support earned him her eternal gratitude.
He almost wept in gratitude when he saw the money.
I would like to express my deep sense of gratitude to the staff for their patience.

words: as a token of your gratitude
examples: I sent him some money as a token of my gratitude.

words: owe a debt of gratitude to sb
examples: We owe her a deep debt of gratitude for her services.
